element.short: Upper limit on medication per administration
element.definition: Upper limit on medication per administration.
element.comment: This is intended for use as an adjunct to the dosage when there is an upper cap.  For example, a body surface area related dose with a maximum amount, such as 1.5 mg/m2 (maximum 2 mg) IV over 5 â€“ 10 minutes would have doseQuantity of 1.5 mg/m2 and maxDosePerAdministration of 2 mg.
element.requirements: The maximum total quantity of a therapeutic substance that may be administered to a subject per administration.
